channel.title: War Food Movies Music Broox Apple on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in War Food Movies Music Broox Apple on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: this morning.
item.description: I woke up and attempted my hardest to not make it to work. however, much to my chagrin, I now find myself at work. on the way in - I listened to midnight oil’s diesel and dust. I have been listening to music from my past lately. it is pretty fun. yesterday I purchased a bunch of crosby and nash and then a bunch of neil young. both are so so good.
